snippet: Animation of Manhattan in flames, taken from a video game, is part of a sleeping citizen’s dream of a glorious future of rocket launchings and the reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
abstract: North Korean government Web site Uriminzokkiri posts propaganda video depicting Manhattan in flames and envisioning glorious future of rocket launchings and reunification of Korean peninsula; video, which seeks to capitalize on North Korea's December 12 launching of Unha-3 rocket, is part of years long effort by North to reach South Koreans and Koreans around world through Internet.

byline.contributor: Marc Santora and Robert Mackey contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Animation of Manhattan in flames, taken from a video game, is part of a sleeping citizen’s dream of a glorious future of rocket launchings and the reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

headline.seo: North Korea Propaganda Video Imagines U.S. in Flames
headline.main: In Propaganda Video, Only North Korea Sleeps Easy
headline.print_headline: In Korea Clip, Only North Sleeps Easy
